txt.en: 'Talk to Calendorion about replacing the flowers. He is at one of the piers, looking out towards the Bay of Belfalas.\n\n'I apologize, I can say no more; his story is not mine to tell.'
You should ask the Avorrim around Edhellond what kind of flowers to put in the now-empty vase.
'My apologies, I have no answer for you. Calendorion would have a better idea of which flowers to pick for the vase.\n\n'You may find him at one of the piers in Edhellond, watching the bay.'

'I... I am sorry you had to clean up my mess, traveller. I arranged those flowers for one who perished here during the war, but I cannot bring myself to return to that spot. The grief is still too much to bear. I had not wanted to admit this to my fellow Avorrim -- it felt trifling, almost. But perhaps it would be prudent for me to ask for aid.\n\n'If you wish to replace the flowers, there is one type you may find near the piers here that has soft, pink petals. It was Lhinnedhel's favourite kind. Indeed, I believe it is a beautiful flower.'
